SEARCH
Package cdx.opencdx.commons.service

Interface OpenCDXMessageService

All Known Implementing Classes:
NatsOpenCDXMessageServiceImpl, NoOpOpenCDXMessageServiceImpl
public interface OpenCDXMessageService
The OpenCDXMessageService interface provides methods for subscribing to message subjects, unsubscribing from message subjects, and sending messages.
Implementation Requirements:
This interface was designed to be agnostic of messaging system.
Implementation Note:
Two implementation are provided NatsOpenCDXMessageServiceImpl based on the NATS message server, and NoOpOpenCDXMessageServiceImpl a NOOP implementation that is used for JUnit testing.

  • Method Details

    • subscribe

      void subscribe(String subject, OpenCDXMessageHandler handler)
      Subscribe to a message subject and the handlers for received those messages for processing.
      Parameters:
      subject - String indicating the subject to subscribe to.
      handler - OpenCDXMessageHandler for processing the messages.

    • unSubscribe

      void unSubscribe(String subject)
      Method to unsubscribe to a set of messages.
      Parameters:
      subject - String indicating the subject to un-subscribe to.

    • send

      void send(String subject, Object object)
      Method to send an object as a Message.
      Parameters:
      subject - Subject to send the message on.
      object - Object to send as message.
